title: Amendment to the 11th Regulation under Press Council (General) Regulations of the  Sri Lanka Press Council Law, No.05 of 1973
decision_details: the proposal made by Hon. Keheliya Rambukwella, Minister of Mass Media and Information, to submit the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.1797/21 dated 2013?02?15 pertaining to the above amendment, in Parliament for approval, was approved by the Cabinet.
